title: Black Friday 2023 laptop deals from Dell, HP, Lenovo, Apple, Microsoft, and more
content:
Whether you want to upgrade your computing clamshell for work or play this holiday, or you're looking to gift one, Black Friday is the perfect place to start. There are plenty of discounts on popular laptop brands from Apple, Asus, Dell, HP, Lenovo, Microsoft, and more. We'll also be updating this post throughout the week for the latest savings and deals, so check back frequently.
